statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); folder=$(basename "$(pwd)"); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // "N/A"'); total_in=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_input_tokens // 0'); total_out=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.total_output_tokens // 0'); ctx_size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size // 1'); session_pct=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.1f\", (($total_in + $total_out) / $ctx_size) * 100}"); echo "$model | $folder | Context: $used% used | Session: $session_pct% used"
